headline: A Polish Museum Turns to the Right, and Artists Turn Away
abstract: A new director wants to reshape a leading Warsaw art space to show conservative works and challenge left-wing positions.
lead_paragraph: WARSAW — Piotr Bernatowicz is one of the most talked about figures in Poland’s art world this winter, for one reason: Many artists say he’s about to destroy a leading Warsaw art museum.
keywords: Ujazdowski Castle Center for Contemporary Art
